name: Verify Manager can promote Reader to Writer
description:
-Login with valid credentials.
-Create new organization via API.
-Create new project.
-Signup second user.
-Invite second user to organization via API.
-Invite second user to project with Manager role.
-Signup third user.
-Invite third user to organization via API.
-Invite third user to project with Reader role.
Verify that:
    - Manager can promote Reader to Writer
descriptionHtml:
-Login with valid credentials.
-Create new organization via API.
-Create new project.
-Signup second user.
-Invite second user to organization via API.
-Invite second user to project with Manager role.
-Signup third user.
-Invite third user to organization via API.
-Invite third user to project with Reader role.
Verify that:
- Manager can promote Reader to Writer

testStage.description:
-Login with valid credentials.
-Create new organization via API.
-Create new project.
-Signup second user.
-Invite second user to organization via API.
-Invite second user to project with Manager role.
-Signup third user.
-Invite third user to organization via API.
-Invite third user to project with Reader role.
Verify that:
    - Manager can promote Reader to Writer

Message: User role should be Writer!
